name: Pizza Out In Space
description:
Play as Nack on his way home to stream. Things take a turn and well... all your treasure is scattered around the islands.

Can you find all your trinkets and make it on time to stream for once in your life?

No

[CONTROLS]
controls are simple, you'll figure it out. There's also controller support, but not for the menu
